Work

  • 07.2022 - 12.2024
    Fiserv (Clover)
    Software Engineer
    At Clover, I worked on web dashboards for business owners, focusing on flows like Payroll, Employees, and Merchant Profile. I used React and TypeScript to build components and enhance the overall UI/UX. I also collaborated closely with design/product teams to align on features as well as backend engineers to integrate APIs and handle data.
    • React, Typescript, Java, Spring Boot, Git, Docker, Kubernetes, GCP, Kafka
  • 06.2021 - 06.2022
    SOBA New Jersey
    Lead System Administrator
    At SOBA, I was one of the lead system administrators, where I used Python to automate tasks like user onboarding and system maintenance. I managed Active Directory for account and access control, and handled the organization’s phone systems and internet infrastructure to ensure everything ran smoothly.
    • Python, Raspberry Pi, Linux, Active Directory
  • 01.2021 - 05.2021
    Stony Brook University
    Software Engineer Research Assistant
    As a research intern at Stony Brook, I collaborated with a team of students to build a web platform for managing class assignments and student submissions. We used Java and MongoDB for the backend and JavaScript on the frontend, aiming to streamline the submission process for both students and the professor.
    • Javascript, CSS, Java, MongoDB
